subject: Attention Please.
body:
Attention Please.
I am Peter Joseph Thornton (Esq) a legal practitioner.
Do you have any profitable business in which we can invest the sum of
fourteen million dollars within a period of 5 to 7 years? My client
shares the same last name with you. Your urgent response will be
appreciated.
Regards,
P.J Thornton (Esq)

subject: Re:   Attention Please.
body:
Dear Mr. Thornton,

Thank you for your email and the opportunity to invest such a significant amount of money. I am indeed interested in discussing this further.

However, before we proceed, could you please provide more details about your client and the nature of the investment they are looking to make? It would also be helpful to understand why my last name is relevant in this context.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Denise
